name: Tag Checker bot
description: A bot to hide the Sender of Messages

Tag_Check_Group.description: Your Group id where you want to check user's tags (must include -100 in front)

Tag_Name.description: The Tag name you want to set for checking

Log_Group_id.description: Make a log group to save the details of who has been unmuted. Input the group id here. (must include -100 in front)
